    Controller​(Map map, Mission mission, Graph graph, TSP tsp)

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addRequest()
    Method called by window after a click on the button "Add request" that invokes the concrete addRequest method in a State the concrete implementation is in the AddRequestStates after the CalculatedState
    void calculateTour()
    Method called by window after a click on the button "Calculate tour" that invokes the calculateTour method in a State the concrete implementation is in the RequestLoadedState
    void cancelNewRequest()
    Method called by window after a click on the button "cancel" on the pop up window that invokes the concrete cancelNewRequest method in the AddRequestState5
    void deleteRequest()
    Method called by window after a click on the button "Delete request" that invokes the deleteRequest method in a State the concrete implementation is in the DeleteRequestState after the CalculatedState
    void generateRoadMap()
    Method called by window after a click on the button "Delete request" that invokes the concrete deleteRequest method in a State the concrete implementation is in the CalculatedState
    Graph getGraph()
    get the implementation class of the interface Graph
    ListOfCommands getListOfCommands()
    get the object ListOfCommand from the Controller
    Map getMap()
    get the object Map from the Controller
    Mission getMission()
    get the object Mission from the Controller
    TSP getTsp()
    get the object TSP from the Controller
    void leftClick​(int positionX, int positionY)
    Method called by window after a leftclick of the mouse that invokes the concrete leftClick method in a State the detailed implementation may largely differ in distinct states depending on the functionalities
    void loadMap()
    Method called by window after a click on the button "Load a new map" that invokes the concrete loadMap method in a State
    void loadRequests()
    Method called by window after a click on the button "Load requests" that invokes the concrete loadRequests method in a State
    void redo()
    Method called by window after a click on the button "redo" that invokes the concrete redo method in a State the concrete implementation is in the CalculatedState
    void rightClick()
    Method called by window after a rightclick of the mouse that invokes the concrete rightClick method in a State normally a right click means cancel, if there is an operation that is in progress
    protected void setCurrentState​(State state)
    set the currentState of the Controller
    void undo()
    Method called by window after a click on the button "undo" that invokes the concrete undo method in a State the concrete implementation is in the CalculatedState
    void validateNewRequest()
    Method called by window after a click on the button "validate request" on the pop up window that invokes the concrete validateNewRequest method in the AddRequestState5

  • Constructor Details

    • Controller

      public Controller​(Map map, Mission mission, Graph graph, TSP tsp)
      Constructor of object Controller, creates an instance of Controller with the empty but instanced cityMap, mission and jgraphtMapGraph
      Parameters:
      map - the object Map, currently empty
      mission - the object Mission, currently empty
      graph - the object JgraphtMapGraph, currently empty

      public void leftClick​(int positionX, int positionY)
      Method called by window after a leftclick of the mouse that invokes the concrete leftClick method in a State the detailed implementation may largely differ in distinct states depending on the functionalities
      Parameters:
      positionX - the x position of the mouse on the window
      positionY - the y position of the mouse on the window
